articles.title: Trump administration says it’s freezing child care funds to Minnesota after series of fraud schemes
articles.description:
The announcement comes one day after US Homeland Security officials were in Minneapolis conducting a fraud investigation by going to unidentified businesses and questioning workers.

The post Trump administration says it’s freezing child care funds to Minnesota after series of fraud schemes appeared first on Boston.com.

articles.title: Fitchburg father who appeared to seize while being choked by ICE agent sues agent
articles.description:
The Fitchburg father requested to be evaluated by emergency medical services, but Agent John Doe allegedly “waved EMS away and told them, ‘He’s all good.’”
